ValidationRule.description: For an employee range, both Emps Min and Emps Max need a value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR (AND( NOT(ISNULL( EmpsMin__c )), ISNULL(EmpsMax__c)) ,AND( ISNULL( EmpsMin__c ), NOT(ISNULL(EmpsMax__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For an employee range, both Emps Min and Emps Max need a value.
